map

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • physics.Collider
      • physics.Damagable
        • map.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, NetObject, NetPlayer

    public class Player
extends Damagable
implements NetPlayer
    This is the player class. It represents one player in the game. The player receives only input form the player identified by the playerID parameter
    Author:
    jafi2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
